subject: Your finance application has been cancelled

rows.text: Your finance application has been cancelled due to your request to either the lender or Kanda to cancel your finance application. You can still apply again if this was a mistake. To apply again, you'll need to request a new credit introduction from {{extras.branch.trading_name}}.

rows.subtext: For finance queries please email Kanda at support@kanda.co.uk or call us on 0330 808 3911. For order queries, please email {{extras.branch.contact_email}} or call {{extras.branch.contact_phone}}.
